title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.7 - Incorporation by reference
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.7 - Incorporation by reference

State Regulations
(a) Any
documents or parts thereof incorporated by reference in this Part are a part of
this regulation as though set out in full herein. (b) All incorporated documents are available
for inspection at the department. In addition, the documents are available at
the addresses provided in section
10.3
of this Title. (c) The full titles for the publications
incorporated by reference in this Part are provided in section
10.3
of this Title. Numbers in
parentheses indicate applicable editions. Earlier editions of documents listed
or editions of documents formerly listed may be used for materials and
components manufactured, designed, or installed in accordance with those
earlier editions at the time they were listed. (d) Some standards and specifications cited
an Appendices 14-A and 14-B of this Title are supplemented by specific
requirements elsewhere in this Part. Users of this Part are advised against
attempting direct application of any of these standards without carefully
observing this Part's reference to that standard. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
